{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Pallegina's Farewell
| icon           = poe2 plain_letter icon.png
| description    = Pallegina mes Rèi, Frermà Guone do Frermàs mes Canc Suolias to the Watcher of Caed Nua, lately of Neketaka,

I regret to inform you that due to your recent hostile actions toward the Vailian Trading Company, I am obligated to return to my superiors and give them a full accounting of our time together. I will not be returning.

If you have any concerns or complaints about my service, please direct them to the Ducess Spirento.
